reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Click the 'MPX Login' link.
Wait for 'Update' button to be visible.
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Verify the text 'You are about to delete account' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'and all of its assets. This action cannot be undone.' is present on the page.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Deleting MPX Account'.
Wait for the frame titled 'Deleting MPX Account' to close.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Beginning process of deleting account' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automation.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the number of results in the result set.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Click the 'Add Account' button.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for Account...' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for Account...' text box.
Click the 'Connect to MPX' button.
Verify success message of 'Login successful' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Select 'DB TV' from the first 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Verify success message of 'Setting import account "DB%20TV" for account' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Select 'Auditude Demo player' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Verify success message of 'Processed video import/update manually for all accounts.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify success message of 'Cron ran successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Enter title Automation.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
